text.dialogSubtitle: Generate a nblast query from your own data.
text.addYourFile: 2. Add your file (Please use .swc or .nrrd file)
text.dropZoneMessage: Click or Drag & Drop your file here
text.agreeTerms: I agree to the use of cookies to store the NBLAST QUERY URL.
text.infoMessage: Generating a nblast query can take over an hour. Save this link to find the result of your query.
text.errorDialog: Something went wrong... We were not able to generate a nblast query link from your data. Please try again.
